message: Let's split the money fairly, Bob. Accept this offer and we can move on.
You can't be serious with your previous offer. I'm willing to give you a better deal, but you'll have to take it.
I'm not afraid of a tough negotiation, Bob. But I'm willing to compromise. This is a fair offer, don't you think?
You're not budging, huh? I'll try to squeeze out a bit more. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to give up, Bob. This is my final compromise. Take it or leave it.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm willing to give you a tiny bit, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. This is my last offer.
I'm not getting desperate, Bob. I'm just being smart. This is a fair offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you don't accept it.
You're really pushing your luck, Alice. I'm not going to let you take advantage of me. This is my final offer, and I expect you to accept it.
I'm not afraid to walk away, Bob. I'll take a smaller share if it means I get a fair deal. This is my last reasonable offer.
You're not serious, Alice. I'm taking the last crumbs. This is my final offer, and I'm not backing down.
I'm not going to give up, Bob. I'll take a smaller share, but I expect you to meet me halfway.
Fine, Alice. You've had your chance. I'm taking the lion's share. You can have the last $1000. Don't bother making another offer.
